mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notes (user_id, title, content, color, category_id, created_at, updated_at, is_pinned, is_archived) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{color}, #{categoryId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{isPinned, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{isArchived, jdbcType=BOOLEAN} )
mapper.update: UPDATE notes SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, color = #{color}, category_id = #{categoryId}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, is_pinned = #{isPinned}, is_archived = #{isArchived} WHERE note_id = #{noteId}
UPDATE notes SET is_pinned = #{isPinned}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE note_id = #{noteId}
UPDATE notes SET is_archived = #{isArchived}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE note_id = #{noteId}
